marklogic.body: First Off, His At Night and Not Quite a Husband are 2 of my fave reads. :)And Beguiling the Beauty has been on my tbr list for a while now.. can't wait to read. This question is a little tough because I think all are important together. Emotional intensity will probably have to be the top because there has to be a sense of intensity and urgency for me to get the characters together, to the point where they would change for each other or do anything/sacrafice anything to be together.Â Then I like a little humor.Â It doesn't have to be a riot, laugh every page but humor placed in perfect Spots to break up all that intense emotion.Â You don't want to be completely drained or a wreck when you read lolÂ Â I think humor can go along with witty banter, which is a must for me.
